requirements.summary: Remove the header logo image while preserving header branding text and navigation behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: The header no longer renders the image `assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png`.
The header still displays the site name text and the desktop/mobile navigation works as before.
No layout regressions: header height/spacing looks intentional on mobile and desktop.
No console errors/warnings caused by unused imports or missing assets (e.g., remove `assetUrl` import from `SiteHeader.tsx` if no longer needed).

file_operations.description: Remove the header logo block that references assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png, keep the site name text and existing desktop/mobile navigation and scroll behavior unchanged, and adjust spacing (e.g., container gap/alignment) so header height/spacing remains intentional without the logo. Remove now-unused imports such as assetUrl to avoid console/lint warnings.

requirements.summary: Remove the footer logo image while preserving footer branding text, quick links, and social links.
acceptanceCriteria: The footer no longer renders the image `assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png`.
Footer text content, quick links scrolling behavior, and existing social links remain present and functional.
No layout regressions: footer branding area aligns cleanly without the logo image.
No console errors/warnings caused by unused imports or missing assets (e.g., remove `assetUrl` import from `SiteFooter.tsx` if no longer needed).

file_operations.description: Remove the footer logo block that references assets/generated/blaines-card-clinic-logo.dim_512x512.png while keeping the footer brand text, description paragraph, quick links (scrollIntoView behavior), and existing social URLs/links intact. Adjust alignment/spacing of the brand row so it looks clean without the logo. Remove now-unused imports such as assetUrl to avoid console/lint warnings.
